roleset.name: request

example.name: transitive
example.text: USX announced in October that it was soliciting bids to sell TXO's oil and gas reserves.
example.arg: bids to sell TXO's oil and gas reserves

example.name: with arg2
example.text: After Mr. Ackerman announced he was soliciting consents from shareholders in order to wrest control of Datapoint from Mr. Edelman, the corporate raider purchased 30% of Datapoint's shares.
example.arg: in order to wrest control of Datapoint from Mr. Edelman

example.name: misplaced modifier
example.text: Hilton currently is soliciting bids for a sale of part or all of its hotel and casino businesses.
example.arg: for a sale of part or all of its hotel and casino businesses
example.note: The argM should really be part of the arg1; it's "bids for a sale..." that Hilton is soliciting; the given syntax implies that Hilton is soliciting bids on the behalf of a sale, which doesn't make any sense at all.

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus.. Comparison with 'request'. No VNcls.
